name: .WEBARCHIVE
summary: Learn about .WEBARCHIVE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a WEBARCHIVE file with Safari (macOS, iOS) to view the webpage it contains. You can also open WEBARCHIVE files with the iCab web browser.

If you do not have access to a web browser, or you want to view the HTML data your WEBARCHIVE file contains, you can open the file in Apple TextEdit or any other text editor. Keep in mind that any images and other binary content your WEBARCHIVE file contains will not appear correctly.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .webarchive file in Apple Safari
images.caption: WEBARCHIVE file open in Apple Safari
